rules_text:
Regression–{1}{B}, Pay 2 life [i](If you cast this for its regression cost, it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of your next upkeep and create a 1/1 copy of it with haste.)[/i]
Anguished Revenant can’t block.
You may cast Anguished Revenant from your graveyard for its regression cost.
